snippet: Ted Brown brought his quartet and his retiring but nuanced style to the Mikano Hotel in a rare New York appearance.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performance by the Ted Brown Quartet at the Kitano Hotel.
lead_paragraph: Ted Brown brought his quartet and his retiring but nuanced style to the Mikano Hotel in a rare New York appearance.
